post.body: yeah but since you <3 satan, what's the problem?
why can't we all just get along? 1 planet 1 people 1 vision. One 24 hour performance by me & guests at a special may pancakes
watch what you say. You may end up owning a little girl someday. And you'll have to eat those words cuz she is so adorable!
Today's <3 song is "i could never grow bored of watching you suffer" for nobu. Made btw on the ds korg, loachparty. It's Rebirth 4 the ds
Baroquetronica? Tabula chaosa? I don't think i'm noizak anymore. Musique concrete isn't it either these days
I <3 my technology. We are at nobu's mixing in live now
Note to world: nobu suto aka nobu stowe, Worst. Bartender. Ever.
http://twitpic.com/zfmm -
http://twitpic.com/zfmj -
That last pic is nobu buying food for his ghost cat.
The smell of the giant seafood counter is overwhelming. Think nyc chinatown in july.
http://twitpic.com/zfba -
Any of my tweeps know a good restaurant in baltimore?
Frakking bingo parlor! And the bbq is on holiday until monday! Oh damn!
The improvement in my sinuses after a day out of the house suggests nobu's theory, that i have a cold & not allergies, is incorrect
I. Now we're off for north carolina style bbq. Sour!
Laid down 3 extended tracks, about 2 hours of music. Nobu is pleased with how we sounded. As are dan &
Dc has a suburb named beltsville. Gotta love a developer w a sense of humor.
Heading to dc to record w daniel barbiero, contemporary composition double bassist. Very exciting
Very fond of the pronunciation monthes for months.
